thread.title: Are Chance the Rapper & Childish Gambino Finally Working on Their Long-Awaited Collaborative Project?
thread.title_full: Are Chance the Rapper & Childish Gambino Finally Working on Their Long-Awaited Collaborative Project?

author: Hypebeast (info@hypebeast.com)
title: Are Chance the Rapper & Childish Gambino Finally Working on Their Long-Awaited Collaborative Project?
text:
Chance the Rapper and Childish Gambino surprised fans when it was revealed they were working on a collaborative tape back in 2014. Unfortunately the project never ended up seeing the light of day as both artists were said to be very busy and in different spaces. Given the lack of general information in the first place and absence of updates thereafter, aside from a reddit AMA confirming the tape's existence, most fans were ready to give up hope on a potential release until yesterday. Chance posted a picture of the two together on his Instagram account with the caption "Hawaii then LA, back to work. # roscoeswetsuit ," prompting immediate speculation that the long-awaited project was one step closer to being completed. Could it just be wishful thinking? Let us know your thoughts in the comments below.
Click here to view full gallery at Hypebeast.com
